content: k1 until 4 sts before end p1 k2tog k1 remove all markers as you come across them row 02 k1 p1 until 1 st is left k1 row 03 k1 ssk k1 p1 until 4 sts before end k1 k2tog k1 row 04 k1 p1 p1 ki1 until 3 sts are left p2 k1 repeat these 4 row twice more 12 row knitted 15 sts left on your needle for the button hole knit the last 4 row as follows row 01 k1 ssk p1 k1 p1 b/o 3 sts p1 k1 p1 k2tog k1 row 02 k1 p1 x2 k1 c/o 3 sts k1 p1 x2 k1 row 03 k1 ssk k1 p1 until 4 sts before end k1 k2tog k1 row 04 k1 p1 p1 ki1 until 3 sts are left p2 k1 bind off all sts attach button to part i and you re done new teal version made from cascade 220 202m / 100g in hunter green page 2
